titles: Christian praiers and holie meditations as wel for priuate as publique exercise: gathered out of the most godly learned in our time, by Henrie Bull. Whereunto are added the praiers, commonly called Lidleys praiers.
author: Bull, Henry, d. 1575?
Ledley, John.
Bradford, John, 1510?-1555. Godlie instruction, conteining the summe of all the divinitie necessary for a Christian conscience. aut
publisher: Printed by R. Robinson, for S. Waterson. and N. Ling,
notes: Includes, with caption title, "A godlie instruction, conteining the summe of all the divinitie necessary for a Christian conscience".
